samirg:AntiInterference.NAME: Anti-Interference Index
DESCRIPTION: Anti-Interference Index. NL You should consume 1 Anti-Interference Index to enter the #ySecluded #yPassage or move horizontally. NL NL #bWay #bto #bgain: Dropped after the combat, or bought in the shop for #y50 coins.

samirg:IrreversibleMatrix.NAME: Singular Matrix
DESCRIPTION: #yTake #yeffect #yall #yalong NL Increase the Max HP of all enemies by #b
%, increase the damage they can deal by #b
% . NL If the level of Singular Matrix is unless than 3, extra enemy will appear in combats.

samirg:Dequantization01.NAME: Paradigm:De-quantification
DESCRIPTION: NL When you lose coins or HP in non-combat node, lose extra #b25% of them (You won't die because of this) NL #yEvery #yenemies #ylose #y2 #yStrength .

samirg:Dequantization02.NAME: Paradigm:Intensified De-quantification
DESCRIPTION: NL When you lose coins or HP in non-combat node, lose extra #b50% of them (You won't die because of this) NL The #rParadigm has been intensified

samirg:SubstantialCollapse01.NAME: Paradigm:Substantial Collapse
DESCRIPTION: NL The damage your #yAttack can deal will be decreased by #b1 after being played each time(At most 4).

samirg:SubstantialCollapse02.NAME: Paradigm:Propagating Collapse
DESCRIPTION: NL The damage your #yAttack can deal will be decreased by #b2 after being played each time(At most 4). NL The #rParadigm has been intensified

samirg:NonlinearMovement01.NAME: Paradigm:Non-linear Movement
DESCRIPTION: NL Increase the HP of all enemies by extra #b20% . Every enemies get #b1Flight. NL #yYou #ygian #y2 #yDexterity .

samirg:NonlinearMovement02.NAME: Paradigm:Non-linear Action
DESCRIPTION: NL NL Increase the HP of all enemies by extra #b30% . Every enemies get #b1Flight. NL The #rParadigm has been intensified

samirg:EmotionalEntity01.NAME: Paradigm:Emotional Entity
DESCRIPTION: NL Every #yEntity get #b1 random effect: NL 1. #y1 #yArtifact NL 2. #y2 #yRegen NL 3. #y4 #yMetallicize NL 4. #y8 #yPlated #yArmor

samirg:EmotionalEntity02.NAME: Paradigm:Terrifying Entity
DESCRIPTION: NL Every #yEnemy get #b2 random effect: NL 1. #y1 #yArtifact NL 2. #y2 #yRegen NL 3. #y4 #yMetallicize NL 4. #y8 #yPlated #yArmor NL The #rParadigm has been intensified

samirg:PansocialParadox01.NAME: Paradigm:Pan-Society Paradox
DESCRIPTION: NL The items' price sold in the shop will be increased by #b25%

samirg:PansocialParadox02.NAME: Paradigm:Pan-Civilization Paradox
DESCRIPTION: NL The items' price sold in the shop will be increased by #b50% . The price of #yCommon relics,potions and card will be increased by extra #b50%  NL The #rParadigm has been intensified

samirg:AbnormalAirpressure01.NAME: Paradigm:Barometric Anomaly
DESCRIPTION: NL At the start of combat, shuffle #b1 #yVoid to your draw pile . NL #yYou #ywill #ydraw #y2 #yextra #ycards #yin #ynext #yturn .

samirg:AbnormalAirpressure02.NAME: Paradigm:Barometric Disorder
DESCRIPTION: NL At the start of combat, shuffle #b3 #yVoid to your draw pile . NL The #rParadigm has been intensified

samirg:TriggeringInjury01.NAME: Paradigm:Injury Trigger
DESCRIPTION: NL At the start of combat, gain #b1 #yFrail . NL #yYou #ygain #y1 #yenergy .

samirg:TriggeringInjury02.NAME: Paradigm:Crisis Trigger
DESCRIPTION: NL At the start of combat, gain #b1 #yWeak, #yFrail and #yVulnerable . NL The #rParadigm has been intensified

samirg:ConvergentConsumption01.NAME: Paradigm:Convergence Consumption
DESCRIPTION: NL After every combat, you lose #b1 Max HP(Won't be less than 20), #yand #yheal #y4 #yHP .

samirg:ConvergentConsumption02.NAME: Paradigm:Convergence Deficiency
DESCRIPTION: NL After every combat, you lose #b2 Max HP(Won't be less than 20). NL The #rParadigm has been intensified
